title: Drawing, "Textile Design: Floral Border", 1800–1801
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on white wove paper
inscribed: Lower right, pen and black ink, Jean Du Bois le 13 juin 1801/ no 13
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Multicolored floral border with carnations, pansies, small floral sprigs above. Edges torn.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design: Floral Border", 1800–1801.
1800–1801. Brush and gouache, graphite on white wove paper. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1957-46-7.
